ensemble.world

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • ensemble.world.World
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifeCycle, RouterClient
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LM_World

    public class World
extends java.lang.Object
implements LifeCycle, RouterClient
    Represents the actual state of the world, with all its entities.
